verses.text: \w Then|strong="H2009"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w came|strong="H3478"\w* \w together|strong="H6908"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w at|strong="H3478"\w* \w Hebron|strong="H2275"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* said, “\w Here|strong="H2009"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w are|strong="H6106"\w*, \w your|strong="H3605"\w* own \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* blood.

\w So|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H5375"\w* \w Three|strong="H7969"\w* \w broke|strong="H1234"\w* \w through|strong="H1234"\w* \w the|strong="H5375"\w* \w Philistine|strong="H6430"\w* \w camp|strong="H4264"\w*, \w drew|strong="H7579"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w* \w from|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5375"\w* well \w at|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5375"\w* \w gate|strong="H8179"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Bethlehem|strong="H1035"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w brought|strong="H5375"\w* \w it|strong="H5375"\w* back \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*. \w But|strong="H3808"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w refused|strong="H3808"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w drink|strong="H8354"\w* \w it|strong="H5375"\w*; \w instead|strong="H3808"\w*, \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w poured|strong="H5258"\w* \w it|strong="H5375"\w* \w out|strong="H5258"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5375"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*,

Now these \w were|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3097"\w* \w mighty|strong="H1368"\w* \w men|strong="H1368"\w*: Asahel the brother of Joab, Elhanan son of Dodo of Bethlehem,
Shammoth the Harorite,\f + \fr 11:27 \ft Shammoth the Harorite is a variant of Shammah the Harodite; see 2 Samuel 23:25.\f* Helez the Pelonite,
Ira son of Ikkesh the Tekoite, Abiezer the Anathothite,
Sibbecai the Hushathite, Ilai the Ahohite,
Maharai the Netophathite, Heled son of Baanah the Netophathite,
Ithai \f + \fr 11:31 \ft Ithai is a variant of Ittai; see 2 Samuel 23:29.\f* son of Ribai from Gibeah of the Benjamites, Benaiah the Pirathonite,

Hurai \f + \fr 11:32 \ft Hurai is a variant of Hiddai; see 2 Samuel 23:30.\f* from the brooks \f + \fr 11:32 \ft Or from the ravines\f* of Gaash, Abiel \f + \fr 11:32 \ft Abiel is a variant of Abi-albon; see 2 Samuel 23:31.\f* the Arbathite,
Azmaveth the Baharumite,\f + \fr 11:33 \ft Baharumite is a variant of Barhumite; see 2 Samuel 23:31.\f* Eliahba the Shaalbonite,
the sons of Hashem \f + \fr 11:34 \ft Hashem is a variant of Jashen; see LXX and 2 Samuel 23:32.\f* the Gizonite, Jonathan son of Shagee the Hararite,
Ahiam son of Sachar \f + \fr 11:35 \ft Sachar is a variant of Sharar; see 2 Samuel 23:33.\f* the Hararite, Eliphal son of Ur,
Hepher the Mecherathite, Ahijah the Pelonite,
Hezro the Carmelite, Naarai son of Ezbai,
Joel the brother of Nathan, Mibhar son of Hagri,
Zelek the Ammonite, Naharai the Beerothite, the armor-bearer of Joab son of Zeruiah,
Ira the Ithrite, Gareb the Ithrite,
Uriah the Hittite, Zabad son of Ahlai,
Adina son of Shiza the Reubenite, chief of the Reubenites, and the thirty with him,
Hanan son of Maacah, Joshaphat the Mithnite,
Uzzia the Ashterathite, Shama and Jeiel the sons of Hotham the Aroerite,
Jediael son of Shimri and his brother Joha the Tizite,
Eliel the Mahavite, Jeribai and Joshaviah, the sons of Elnaam, Ithmah the Moabite,
Eliel, Obed, and Jaasiel the Mezobaite.
